column2: "Na ber a wɔwoo Jesus wɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm wɔ Judea
column3: wɔ Ɔhen Herod aber do no
column5: enyansafo bi fi boka baa Jerusalɛm bebisaa dɛ
column7: "Hen na nyia wɔawo no Jewfo Hen no wɔ? Na yehun no woraba wɔ boka

column2: "Na ohyiaa ɔman no asɔfompanyin nye akyerɛwfo nyina no
column3: obisabisaa hɔn fakor a wɔbɔwo Kraest no."

column4: na dɛm na nkɔnhyɛnyi no akyerɛw dɛ
column9: Ampaara ennyɛ kumaba wɔ Juda asafohen no mu: Na ɔwo wo mu na ambrado befi aba; Ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ me man Israel no guanhwɛfo."

column2: "Na Herod frɛɛ enyansafo no wɔ nsumaa mu no
column3: obisaa hɔn ber a woraba no puei no ara yie."
Hom nkɔ nkɔhwehwɛ abofraba no ho asɛm yie
column4: na sɛ hom hu no a
column6: ma mo so membra mombɔkotow no bi."

column5: woraba a wohunii wɔ boka no dzii hɔn enyim kodur dɛ okegyinaa mbrɛ abofraba no wɔ no etsifi."

column2: "Na wɔbaa dan no mu bohun abofraba no ɔnye ne na Mary
column4: na wobuee hɔn akoradze kyɛɛ no adze
column5: sika nye krɔbɔw nye eduhuam mɛɛr."

column2: "Na woyii kyerɛɛ hɔn adaaso mu dɛ mma wɔnnsan nnkɔ Herod nkyɛn bio no
column3: wɔfaa kwan fofor bi do sanee kɔr hɔn kurow mu."

column4: Ewuradze no bɔfoe yii noho kyerɛɛ Josef adaaso mu see no dɛ
column6: fa abofraba no nye ne na guan kɔ Egypt
column7: na tsena hɔ kodu dɛ mebɛse wo: na Herod robɔhwehwɛ abofraba no eku no."

column3: ɔfaa abofraba no nye ne na anadwe
column6: "na ɔwɔ hɔ araa dze kodur Herod no wu
column7: ma dza Ewuradze nam nkɔnhyɛnyi no do kae no aaba mu dɛ

column2: "Na Herod hun dɛ enyansafo no edzi no ho fɛw no
column4: na ɔsomae ma wokokum mbofra nyina a wɔwɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm nye no ntoaado nyina a woedzi mfe ebien nye hɔn a wonnyae nndzii
column5: dɛ mbrɛ mber a obisaa enyansafo no yie no wɔkyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Nna dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia kae no baa mu dɛ
column7: Na ɔmmpɛ dɛ wɔkyekye no werɛ

column4: EWURADZE no bɔfoe yii noho kyerɛɛ Josef adaaso mu wɔ Egypt see no dɛ
column7: fa abofraba no nye ne na kɔ Israel asaase do
column8: na hɔn a nna wɔrohwehwɛ abofraba no eku no no

column2: "Nna ɔsoɛree faa abofraba no nye ne na na ɔbaa Israel asaase do."
"Na ɔtsee dɛ Arkelaus ridzi hen wɔ Judea wɔ n’egya Herod ananmu no
column4: na woyii kyerɛɛ no adaaso mu no
